about_the_game:
The finished epic tactics RPG is finally here!

Deep below Legacio is the land known as Centralia. Within lies three city-kingdoms which include Gala, where our story begins.

Ruby Pyre is a thief who gets caught, but is given an opportunity by the King's nephew to become a General of Gala's Woman Army. Red Cloud, a shadow, failed to save Ruby and vows to stop the royal family.

Gala, using its male and female armies, are set off to find an ancient treasure said to contain some strange power. So begins the war of the sexes in a bid to find the 'cores' in this Core War.

Elle (pronounced Ellie) Clare, Iris Green, Mike Cullen, and many others will join this story in a quest to bring Centralia back to some peace.

Enjoy a thrilling tactics RPG where each decision may end the battle itself!

Credit to Victor Sant & GubiD for Engine.

Gala, using its male and female armies, are set off to find an ancient treasure said to contain some strange power. So begins the war of the sexes in a bid to find the 'cores' in this Core War.

Elle (pronounced Ellie) Clare, Iris Green, Mike Cullen, and many others will join this story in a quest to bring Centralia back to some peace.

name: AMBUSH tactics Advanced

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 / 10 / 11 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Basic Graphics Card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: A simple modern medieval tactics RPG.
